name: Dime Pay – Seamless Payment Processing for Your Business
author: dimepay

sections.description:
The Dime Pay Plugin enables your WordPress site to accept secure and reliable payments with ease. Designed for businesses of all sizes, Dime Pay offers seamless integration, allowing you to process payments online directly through your website. Whether you’re running an e-commerce store, a service-based business, or accepting donations, the Dime Pay Plugin simplifies the payment process.

Key Features

  • Multiple Payment Methods: Accept payments via credit/debit cards, mobile wallets, and local payment options.
  • Secure Transactions: PCI-DSS compliant, ensuring all payment data is encrypted and protected. Includes 3D Secure (3DS) for added fraud prevention and Tokenization to safeguard sensitive card information.
  • Real-Time Payment Processing: Payments are processed instantly, providing immediate confirmation for both you and your customers.
  • Customizable Checkout: Tailor the payment experience to match your brand with customizable, mobile-optimized payment pages.
  • User-Friendly Dashboard: Easily manage transactions, track payment activity, and generate reports from a simple, intuitive interface.
  • Easy Integration: No complex coding required. Install the plugin and configure your settings to start accepting payments quickly.

Why Choose Dime Pay?

Dime Pay is a flexible and scalable solution, empowering businesses to grow while providing customers with a seamless, secure payment experience. Whether you’re just starting out or managing a high-volume business, Dime Pay is built to handle your payment needs efficiently.

Get Started Today

Install the Dime Pay Plugin and start accepting payments securely and effortlessly on your WordPress site.

Features:

  • Secure payment processing
  • Easy integration with WooCommerce

Third Party Services:

sections.installation:
1. Go to wp admin and select plugins
  2. search for dime pay
  3. Press the install button and then the activate button after installation
  4. Configure the payment gateway settings through WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  5. Add your secret key in the field provided

Manual Install

  1. Click download button to get files
  2. Go to wp admin and select plugins
  3. Select add plugin and upload plugin
  4. Press the upload plugin button and select the dime-for-woocommerce zip file
  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  6. Configure the payment gateway settings through WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  7. Add your secret key in the field provided
sections.faq:
How do I configure the Dime Pay payment gateway?

Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments and click on “Dime Pay” to enter your API keys and configure the gateway settings.

What are the requirements for using Dime Pay?

Dime Pay requires WooCommerce version 5.0 or higher and WordPress version 5.0 or higher. PHP 7.4 or higher is also required.
